Antonio Arjona

Passion for automotive art and design

Artist Bio

As an automotive enthusiast, I have dedicated my craft to merging the fine art and automotive passion. My works are a celebration of engineering brilliance and artistic expression. Over the years, I have developed a style that captures the spirit of iconic vehicles, honoring their design and legacy. Each piece is an homage to the automotive icons of the past and present, meticulously crafted to evoke the same admiration I felt growing up surrounded by the allure of classic and contemporary cars.


Iaaaaa. Feel free to write me on Twitter.

Artistic Style

My artistic approach is rooted in Realism, often infused with Pop Art elements to add a modern edge. I primarily work in acrylics, which allows me to achieve vibrant color palettes and fine detail, essential for capturing the precise textures and reflections characteristic of automotive surfaces.

Commissions

I have collaborated with collectors and automotive connoisseurs worldwide, creating bespoke pieces tailored to their personal tastes and preferences. Whether it's for a private collection, a unique centerpiece for a home, or a statement piece for a corporate space, I offer a tailored experience that ensures the final artwork reflects the client's vision. Each commissioned work is crafted to perfection, respecting both the client's specifications and my artistic integrity. All artworks are delivered unframed to maintain flexibility in display.

Exhibitions

My artwork has been featured in various galleries and automotive exhibitions globally, including events focused on motoring history and design innovation. I am open to collaborations with luxury brands, automotive museums, and high-end car shows, as well as exhibitions where automotive heritage and fine art intersect. If you are an art curator, an event organizer, or an automotive aficionado, I would be delighted to discuss potential partnerships.
